resources.string: To make payments from your bKash Account please follow the steps below. (আপনার বিকাশ একাউন্ট থেকে পেমেন্ট করতে নীচের ধাপগুলো অনুসরণ করুন)
How to make "Payment" with bKash Mobile Menu: (বিকাশ মোবাইল মেন্যুর সাহায্যে যেভাবে "পেমেন্ট" করবেন)
“PLANET IT” ‘Web Based International Bulk SMS Gateway Provider. Provides Best in Class Support & Services. Special Fair Pricing for Corporate Users. SMS API for Application Developers.
This service is aimed to provide two way SMS communication. Any organization can provide this service to their target customers to pull information by sending SMS. In reply, customers get a push SMS.
Need a web or mobile application developed? Have an existing application you need to take to the next level? This is exactly what we do all day everyday.
Topup any Bangladeshi GSM mobile anytime from online. Our Mobile Topup app will help to recharge your mobile balance instantly with a friction of second.

Mobile Marketing is the easiest way to promote your business. More than 7 Core people are using Mobile in our country. Let everybody know about you. We will provide the SMS service to reach you in every hand. We provide Low Cost Business SMS Service to reduce your Marketing Cost. Planet IT will provide you new service of most effective Marketing with our Web SMS portal.
